pullRequest.title: apply flak attacks to all flying units
pullRequest.bodyText:
Artillery flak attacks, per TacOps page 185, should apply to any kind of airborne ground unit, e.g. WIGE, VTOL infantry, etc.
Fixes #2043
There's several related issues about vertical splash damage not being applied, but that's a lot more invasive to fix.

commit.message: apply flak attacks to all flying units

nodes.bodyText: Why not do these two steps at once? I understand splitting it off isFlak because of the length, but otherwise.
